function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of AI and Computer Vision technology for social distancing monitoring","Impact":"Potential invasion of privacy, reliance on technology, and misinterpretation of data leading to inaccurate risk assessment","Mitigation":"Ethical data collection, transparent data analysis, and human oversight to validate technology's findings","Technologies":"AI, Computer Vision","People":"Public, individuals in public places","Owner":"Researchers, developers, and policymakers"},{"Description":"Availability of data in GitHub repository","Impact":"Data misuse, unauthorized access, and privacy concerns","Mitigation":"Secure data access, data anonymization, and compliance with data protection regulations","Technologies":"GitHub, data encryption","People":"Research community, public","Owner":"Researchers, GitHub administrators"},{"Description":"Utilization of human detector model for monitoring public spaces","Impact":"Potential misuse for surveillance, violation of privacy, and biases in detection","Mitigation":"Clear guidelines on usage, privacy impact assessments, and regular ethical reviews","Technologies":"Deep Neural Network, Computer Vision","People":"General public, individuals in public spaces","Owner":"Developers, policymakers, and regulatory bodies"}]}
